name: Naeniam Pre-Alpha 1.2
description:
Naeniam Pre-Alpha 1.2 Updates Patch Notes:

--------------------

--7/6/2019-- [Early Access] Pre-Alpha 1.2

--------------------

 || ChangeLog ||
  • Stage 2 The Sewer is now created bit not finished, so you cant play it.
  • Only Goblins enemies has been created on Stage 1 (The Sewer)
    • Goblin
    • Ork Warrior
    • Ork Shaman
    • Masked Ork
    • Swampy
    • Big Ogre
  • Mini Tutorial has been added.
  • Easter Egg has been added.
  • Shop Has been created.
  • Shop system has been added.
    • Buy health potion for 1$.
    • Buy rage potion for 2 $.
    • Buy mana potion for 1 $ Useless.
    • Buy esperience potion for 1 $.
|| Fixed Bugs ||
  • Collision system has been changed, so you shouldn't bug so frequently.
|| Bugs ||
  • You can't play Naeniam on "4/3" resolution.
  • When you are playing Naeniam in "21/9",  player level & player experience are not shown.
|| Game Info ||
  • There are 4 different types of enemies.
    • Undeads
      • Skelet (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Tiny Zombie (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Ice Zombie (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Zombie (40 hp, 10 dmg, poisonous)
      • Muddy (40 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Big Zombie (100 hp, 50 dmg)
    • Goblins
      • Goblin (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Ork Warrior (40 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Ork Shaman (60 hp, 10 dmg, heal)
      • Masked Ork (60 hp, 20 dmg)
      • Swampy (40 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Big Ogre (120 hp, 50 dmg)
    • Demons
      • Imp (20 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Wogol (40 hp, 20 dmg)
      • Chort (60 hp, 20 dmg)
      • Necromancer (40, hp, 10 dmg)
      • Big Demon (140 hp, 60 dmg)
    • Bosses
      • Minotaur (300 hp, 30-50-50 dmg)
      • Stage 2 boss (Not added yet)
      • Stage 3 boss (Not added yet)

If you find more bugs, pls let me know on comments.
